description:
In “Diary of a Madman” Episode 3, Victoria Voxxx’s panic builds as her captor grows increasingly delusional. The days are running together for her, and she isn’t even sure how long she’s been in his grip. Today could be different. Today could be the day she has a fighting chance…but likely not. Victoria tries to get away, but the attempt is futile. She’s tied up, fully suspended and flogged, cropped, whipped, electrified, and made to cum repeatedly. It’s hell on earth for Victoria, but just another day in the Diary of a Madman.

All 4 episodes of this series:
Episode 1: “The Hunt:
Episode 2: “Working The New Pet”
Episode 3: “The Test”
Episode 4: “Problem Solved”
title: Diary of a Madman, Episode 3: "The Test"
